overview: On a summer day in the 1950s, a native girl watches the countryside go by from the backseat of a car. A woman at her kitchen table sings a lullaby in her Cree language. When the girl arrives at her destination, she undergoes a transformation that will turn the woman’s gentle voice into a howl of anger and pain.  In a place like this, there aren’t many chances to be a kid. But, when no one’s watching…  A residential school musical.
title: Savage
